General.Name: Xinjiang Xuefeng Sci-Tech
General.Description: Xinjiang Xuefeng Sci-Tech(Group)Co.,Ltd, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research and development, production, and sale of civil explosives. The company's products include expanded ammonium nitrate explosives, emulsion explosives, industrial electric detonators, industrial digital electronic detonators, nonel tubes, detonators, plastic detonating tubes, industrial detonating cords, and on-site mixed explosives; and industrial industrial, detonators and cables, as well as other civil explosive equipment. It also engaged in the production and sale of chemical products, fertilizers, and liquefied natural gas; transportation of dangerous goods; and natural gas pipeline transportation. It provides engineering blasting services comprising drilling, blasting, digging, and transporting; and professional services, such as blasting scheme design, blasting engineering supervision, and planning and implementation of integrated mine blasting solutions, as well as security guard, business management, and commercial services. The company also engages in exporting activities. Xinjiang Xuefeng Sci-Tech(Group)Co.,Ltd was founded in 1958 and is based in Urumqi, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: Xinjiang Xuefeng Tech Group R&D Center, Urumqi, China, 830026
